Terms & Conditions

Please take a moment to read our Terms of Use before proceeding. By continuing, you agree to the conditions outlined below.

Last updated: July 29, 2025

Thank you for using weewait (“weewait” “we”, “our” or “us”), a digital waitlist technology platform that provides you (“you”, “your” “User”) with access to digital waitlist registries for certain daycares across Canada (the “Platform”).

These Terms of Use (“Terms”) govern your access to and use of the Platform and related services (collectively, the “Services”). By accessing or using the Services, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agreed to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy (collectively, the “Agreement”).

PLEASE READ THESE TERMS CAREFULLY BEFORE ACCESSING OR USING THE SERVICES. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE, YOU MAY NOT ACCESS OR USE THE SERVICES.

Any notice required or permitted to be given by either party to the other under this Agreement is to be in writing. In the case of weewait, notice shall be given by email to: admin@weewait.com.  In the case of User, notice shall be given to the email address associated with the User Account registration.

ENTIRE AGREEMENT

This Agreement and any further terms provided to you by weewait upon or in connection with your use of the Services, constitute the entire agreement between you and weewait with respect to the subject matter hereof and supersedes all prior understandings, negotiations and agreements.
